column5: I'm looking for advertizing information for this board. I'm a firm believer in supporting the people who support you. I'm wondering how or who to contact to find out more information.  Great wbesite with tons of local and out of area information   Michael
Give me or TJ a shout Mike.
How? My PM thingie isn't working very well. (probably me)
I don't think you're the only one, I've looked everywhere and can't find the PM gizmo either.

At the top right of the page there's a scroll box with your name on it. Click on that and go to "messenger'. You can also click on the person's name in a post ...his/her profile will show up. Down the left side of the page click on "Send me a message".

Well, I'm not entirely sure, but when I click on "my name" Fisherman scrollbox, the following 4 drop down, My Profile, My Settings, My Friends and Manage Ignored Users.  Then I clicked on Your name "Roy" above your avatar, looked down the left, the center, the right, from left to right and right to left, some more up and down diagonally, made sure I was seeing the whole page and...drumroll...nada..no "Send me a message"
For some reason you cant use messaging system fisherman.That what it said when I tried.Oh and chat was out as well yesterday.

Okay, I've put a time limit on the "It works fine, watch!" I not one to fall for the one, "How do you keep a feeble minded one occupied for a while"....type "over" on both sides of the page. The only thing that has happened is the level of my coffee has gone down.
Rick i clicked where you pointed to on Roys sample and the picture just got bigger...                      Save yer breath ....i know ...but someone had to be a smert arse
For some reason, you cannot use messaging system.

Are you on an older computer? Older web browser versions will do that sort of thing sometimes.  Or try logging in on another browser... Eg: Netscape, Safari, Fire fox, Internet Explorer, Opera  Could also be your security settings in preferences depending on which browser you are using.  Or refresh your page.  Hope this helps...  Cheers, John  Sorry Roy/TJ, guess this should be in the "Computer help" forum.
Fisherman, try the PM feature now. I checked your settings and the PM feature had been disabled.
COFFEE... there's the problem right there !   You know damn well this place runs on alcohol....
Tabarnak maudit ordinateur, It was the translater tube that was out of wack,  okay, appears the infuser tube is now working, thanks to all. And I do have some Carolans in the coffee..
Ill pm you my address and info to send the cash ( no cheques)...depending on how much you send ....you might be only able to spam your services in this thread before it gets locked....
